description:
JetBrains has announced the integration of its AI tools – including the upgraded AI Assistant and new coding agent Junie – into its IDEs under a single subscription model, complete with a free tier. Love it or loathe it, there’s no denying that AI is disrupting the software development industry. JetBrains, for its part, views... Read more »

The post JetBrains debuts free AI tier and Junie coding agent in IDEs appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: JetBrains debuts free AI tier and Junie coding agent in IDEs
